transcript.text: and it shall come to pass that Yahshua
shall rule and reign from Jerusalem for
thousand years
a dumb shall speak and the blind shall
see and the lame shall jumped and leap
as the heart and the man shall beat
their swords into plowshares they won't
learn war anymore Yahshua will rule from
Jerusalem he will rule with a rod of
iron and he will rule for a thousand
years for a thousand years Satan will be
bound in that pit and Yahshua he will be
crowned the king he will make you shall
I he prays in all the earth angels
dancing banners waving people shouting
and praising peace fills the earth and
the Torah shall go forth
from Zion Yahshua will rule and reign
forever and he will take up his awesome
throne for a thousand years he's gonna
rule for a thousand years and all
nations will come up to Jerusalem every
year for the feast of Sukkot for a 5-10
years it says it in Zechariah 14 a
thousand years the knowledge of Yahweh
will fill the earth and all creation
groans for this day Yahshua will reign
and he will rule the blind will see the
lame will dance the lion and the lamb
will lay down together peace will rule
and the knowledge of fulfill the earth
manners wave people praise all creation
shouts and cries triumph and all hail to
the king
Yahshua he will rule the carpenter from
Nazareth is now made King he will sit
upon his throne and rule not after the
sight of his eyes up with truth and
justice and
witty and salvation will go forth from
Zion and we will rule with him as kings
and priests and all the world will seek
to yahshua the trees were clapping and
the stars will sing all to Yahshua
